document_data.mainbody:
'''''Saving Silverbeard''''', designed by [[Ashley Warren]] and [[Chris Lindsay]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the fourth part of the Sea of Fallen Stars series.

{{Quote|''Powerful elements collide in the wake of the attack on Myth Nantar. The conclusion to the haunting sea-faring tale on the Sea of Fallen Stars.''{{Cite adventurers league/Saving Silverbeard|1}}|}}
